column5: Well with most of the work done, it was time for a little vacation, that we had promised our friends Joe and Jamie, last year.  It was supposed to happen in early June.. but we were . well a bit delayed by the destruction of the camp.  So after a long summer of rebuilding we finally got a bit of R&R time and got to treat them to the full Jiggy.  lol  We started off with a day long ATV ride to some of my favorite spots, especially a lookout that nobody goes into... a bit of a hike but well worth the quick climb..    That night we had a most wonderful moon    Next day it was time for a bit of fishing.  We caught quite a few and then had something Ive seen before happened...   but is pretty rare.        We were in some deeper water.... something I usually troll over just to get to the next good spot, when WHAM Monique (of course)  gets a nice one on.. well she wheels it in and its a medium sized pike with a HAWG hanging off the side of it in its mouth!!!   I've seen this before but never with a big one.. lol...        Back into the river it went... but the smaller one had a good chunk outta it so .. that was gonna be our appetizer that night!    We don't go 200 feet and WHAM!!  She gets another one!!!    And back from whence she/he came!!    Jamie had never cleaned a fish before... so I figured the best first on would be a nice slimy bony pike hahahahaha!!!!    The next day it was time to finally put the woodstove in... the last of the jobs before I could proclaim the rebuilding complete for this year.  Im no carpenter so I oversaw Joes work..  When asked if i wanted to do the honours and cut the hole in the roof.. I quickly used the standard "I gotta go to the bathroom" break excuse... lol      TADA!!!    Now we can get ready for... gulp... hunting???
Monique on a tear with the big pike.  Nice!  Stove... actually the camp entirely, looks great TJ.  Glad the wreckage crew is thru and you're back to relaxing.
Glad to see you're able to get some recreation after all the hard work.
TIS THE SEASON BOSS  Nice report dude.
You've come along ways since the tent TJ and it's good to see the boss is still giving you fish'n lessons
Nice going TJ,and a really nice completed job.  Doesn't get much better!
I couldn't see the walleye pics. What gives???
Nice little spot you have there. Now you can enjoy!!!
Totally awesome so glad that things are working out for you guys at jiggy
Looking great TJ !!!! And I see you are still getting out fished big time !!!! Lol .... But yes glad the repairs are all done and it looks perfect nice spot you have up there !!!! Cheers
Looks great, glad to see you're getting a chance to enjoy the fruits of your hardwork!
